:DEFINE &SRC_FILE_END_CHAR#, string :SET &SRC_FILE_LENGTH# = STR_LENGTH(&UC4RB_DFFT_SOURCE_FILES#) :IF &SRC_FILE_LENGTH# > 0 : SET &SRC_FILE_END_CHAR# = STR_CUT(&UC4RB_DFFT_SOURCE_FILES#, &SRC_FILE_LENGTH#, 1) :ELSE : SET &SRC_FILE_END_CHAR# = "" :ENDIF

:DEFINE &UC4RB_TGT_FILES_DIR1#, string :IF &UC4RB_DFFT_WILDCARD# = "YES" : IF &TGT_FILE_END_CHAR# = "\" OR "/" : SET &UC4RB_TGT_FILES_DIR1# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_DFFT_TARGET_FILES#, "*") : PSET &UC4RB_DFFT_TARGET_FILES# = &UC4RB_TGT_FILES_DIR1# : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_TGT_FILES_DIR1# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_DFFT_TARGET_FILES#, "/*") : PSET &UC4RB_DFFT_TARGET_FILES# = &UC4RB_TGT_FILES_DIR1# : ENDIF :ENDIF
:PRINT UC4RB_DFFT_WILDCARD# was set to "&UC4RB_DFFT_WILDCARD#
